DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine physical activity , lifestyle factor , psychosocial factor relate quality life health outcome across breast cancer survival spectrum diagnosis long term survival nationally representative sample breast cancer patient survivor across 6 month period time .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Breast Cancer Patients Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study ask sign inform consent , wear activity monitor ( similar pedometer ) 7 consecutive day complete packet questionnaire . The questionnaire take 45 minute complete . All material send participant via US Postal Service need mail back provide self-addressed stamped envelope within 2 week . Participants ask repeat assessment 6 month . NO lab visit require participation . Women across U.S. diagnose breast cancer point life seek . There limit time since diagnosis treatment status .
DOC.criteria: Female Have receive breast cancer diagnosis consider self breast cancer patient survivor Aged 18 year old English speaking No limit time since diagnosis Under age 18 Male Have never diagnose breast cancer
